about_the_game:
Pinball Storm: Lokanta Original Soundtrack (OST)

Step into the world of Pinball Storm: Lokanta and experience the auditory feast brought to life by the collaboration between GQ the Bear and xls, with all tracks arranged by GQ the Bear! From electrifying battle themes to serene exploration melodies, and exotic, atmospheric tunes, every piece of music breathes life into this unique gaming universe.

Highlights of the Album:

🎵 Original Creations: Crafted by the talented artist GQ the Bear, the soundtrack perfectly captures the charm of the Lokanta universe.

🎵 Immersive Experience: Seamlessly synchronized with the game's scenes, these tracks amplify the excitement of every adventure and battle.

🎵 A Collector's Item: Not just a game soundtrack, but an unforgettable journey into the art of music, perfect for fans of game soundtracks and audiophiles alike.
